entry.title: Coinbase and Robinhood Shares Slide After Goldman Predicts Low Q1 Earnings
entry.summary: Robinhood shares slipped 5% in intraday trading, while Coinbase was down nearly 2.5%.

entry.title: Ice Cube: NFTs Are the 'Ultimate Fuck You' to Media Gatekeepers
entry.summary: The rapper and actor talks to Decrypt about his plans for music NFTs and how the tech can disrupt the entertainment industry.

entry.title: Tesla, Blockstream and Block Break Ground on All-Solar Bitcoin Mining Facility in Texas
entry.summary: Blockstream says the facility, which will generate 3.8 megawatts of power, will be completed by the end of 2022.

entry.title: Near Protocol Jumps 23% Amid Fresh $350M Funding
entry.summary: The native token behind Near Protocol has enjoyed a heady 24 hours following news that the project had landed another round of new funding.

entry.title: EU Bans High Value Crypto Services to Russia Aimed at Closing Sanctions Loopholes
entry.summary: The European Union has expanded its existing sanctions against Russia to include “high-value crypto-asset services.”

entry.title: FDIC Sounds Alarm on Crypto in Letter to Banks
entry.summary: The U.S. Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation is concerned about the crypto-related risks facing the various banks it supervises.

entry.title: SEC Approves Fourth Bitcoin Futures ETF—But This One Is Different
entry.summary: The SEC has approved another Bitcoin futures ETF to start trading. Here's why that might be good news for a Bitcoin spot ETF.

entry.title: Peter Thiel Unleashes on Ethereum, Warren Buffett and His ‘Enemies' at Bitcoin 2022
entry.summary: Peter Thiel threw cash into the crowd—and insults toward the finance and tech industry—at the Bitcoin 2022 conference in Miami.

entry.title: Mexican Billionaire Ricardo Salinas Says His Liquid Portfolio Is 60% Bitcoin
entry.summary: Mexico’s third-richest man has upped his holdings over the years, he says.

entry.title: Gaming Startup Improbable Raises $150M to Connect Metaverse Worlds
entry.summary: Improbable’s new entity seeks to bring large-scale Web3 metaverse worlds to life—and is valued at $1B thanks to Andreessen and others.

entry.title: Bolt Pays $1.5B for Crypto Startup Wyre in Biggest Crypto Acquisition to Date
entry.summary: Online payment provider Bolt bought crypto services Wyre with the goal of providing "one-click" crypto payments.

entry.title: Luna Foundation Guard to Buy $100 Million in Avalanche to Backstop Terra
entry.summary: Terra-linked Luna Foundation Guard has been boosting the price of Bitcoin. Now it's buying Avalanche (AVAX), too.

entry.title: Robinhood to Use Lightning Network for Bitcoin Transactions
entry.summary: The financial trading app is taking the next step into cryptocurrency investing through the Bitcoin Lightning Network.

entry.title: Treasury's Janet Yellen: 'No One Can Assure You' Stablecoins Can Be Redeemed
entry.summary: U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen remains dubious of stablecoins and says Treasury is still studying centrally-backed digital currency.

entry.title: Here Come NFTs for Kids: YouTube Smash CoComelon Heading to Flow Blockchain
entry.summary: The Zigazoo kids’ social media app is launching NFTs, including those from CoComelon, Blippi, and young artist Nyla Hayes.

entry.title: Cash App Now Offers 'Paid in Bitcoin' Feature, 'Lightning Receive' Coming Soon
entry.summary: Block announced a trio of Bitcoin-related features for Cash App, including the ability to receive Lightning payments.

entry.title: UFC Fighters Can Now Receive Bonuses in Bitcoin
entry.summary: The Ultimate Fighting Championship will soon pay fighters’ bonuses in Bitcoin thanks to a partnership with Crypto.com

entry.title: Why NFTs Need an 'Airbnb of the Metaverse' to Flourish
entry.summary: The financialization of the non-fungible token (NFT) space will help to fuel its growth, says Matrixport founding partner and COO Daniel Yan.

entry.title: Shark Tank’s Kevin O’Leary: ‘Bitcoin Mining Is Going to Save the World’
entry.summary: The former no-coiner believes U.S. stablecoins will “become the reserve currency of the Earth.”

entry.title: Community Gaming Raises $16 Million in Series A from Softbank, Animoca, Binance, ConsenSys
entry.summary: The esports tournaments platform aims to streamline payouts in multiple cryptocurrencies.

entry.title: Texas Man Sentenced to Prison After Laundering $1.4 Million in Crypto
entry.summary: A man from Irving, Texas has been sentenced to 46 months in prison after his involvement in a crypto laundering conspiracy.

entry.title: Trading App eToro Announces $20 Million Creator Fund for NFTs
entry.summary: The trading app plans to support “emerging creators” of NFTs and has been quietly collecting Bored Apes and Crypto Punks.

entry.title: Australian Regulator Reports Uptick of Crypto Use in Investment Scams
entry.summary: Cryptocurrencies have overtaken traditional bank payments when it comes to investment scams, according to Australian regulators.

entry.title: Solana Tumbles 7% as Crypto Markets Correct
entry.summary: Remarks from the Federal Reserve have spooked crypto investors, with leading coins in Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Solana all dropping points on the day.

entry.title: Meta Discussing Creating Tokens for Facebook's Metaverse: Report
entry.summary: Diem may be gone, but Facebook parent company Meta is reportedly exploring other types of tokens as it builds a metaverse.

entry.title: Solana NFTs Can Now Be Traded on OpenSea
entry.summary: At long last, Solana support is finally live on OpenSea—in beta mode.

entry.title: FTX US Holding Back on Token Listings Due to Regulatory Uncertainty: CEO
entry.summary: Brett Harrison contrasted the exchange's strategy with Coinbase's.

entry.title: Pennsylvania Senator Pat Toomey Debuts TRUST Act for Regulating Stablecoins
entry.summary: Those issuing stablecoins will have to publicly disclose the assets that back them—be it cash reserves or something else.

entry.title: Yellen: 'We Haven't Seen Significant Evasion' of Sanctions Using Crypto
entry.summary: The Treasury secretary said the department thinks using crypto to evade sanctions on a large scale "is something that is not easy to do."

entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Drop on Interest Rate Fears as Crypto Market Loses $130 Billion
entry.summary: Bitcoin and Ethereum were down 5% and 8%, respectively. Other coins were hit harder.

entry.title: Terra Adds $230 Million to Push Bitcoin Reserve to $1.6 Billion
entry.summary: Terra founder Do Kwon has said he wants to grow that sum to $10 billion.

entry.title: The IRS's 'Operation Hidden Treasure': What it Means for Crypto Holders
entry.summary: The IRS is determined to raise more revenue from crypto owners and has equipped its agents with the tools to do that.

entry.title: Ubisoft Will Bring Tezos NFTs to Other Games as Ghost Recon Support Ends
entry.summary: Ghost Recon Breakpoint won’t get any further content, but Ubisoft’s Tezos NFT initiative will expand to other games.

entry.title: Binance CEO CZ Vaults Into Forbes Top 20 Richest As $200M Forbes Deal Looms
entry.summary: Changpeng Zhao, who heads crypto exchange Binance, has found his way into Forbes’ 20 richest billionaires list.

entry.title: Former Block Employee Stole Over 8 Million Names, Cash App Account Numbers
entry.summary: A former employee stole 8.2 million names and account numbers from Cash App Invest customers in December, Block said in an SEC filing.

entry.title: ESPN Enters NFTs With Tom Brady Drop on Polygon, Autograph Deal
entry.summary: The sports media giant will debut its first Tom Brady NFTs today, in partnership with the quarterback's own NFT startup.

entry.title: How David Chaum Went From Inventing Digital Cash to Pioneering Digital Privacy
entry.summary: True privacy protection will set people free and secure democracy, says the inventor of eCash and the quantum-resistant, privacy-preserving blockchain xx network.

entry.title: DeFi Market Cools in Q1 Amid Hacks as VCs Pour $2.5B Into Crypto Games
entry.summary: The DeFi market slowed down in Q1. It's a sign of the market maturing and consolidating, says a new DappRadar report.

entry.title: Terraform Labs, LongHash Ventures Roll Out Terra Accelerator Program
entry.summary: Terraform Labs is partnering with LongHash Ventures in a bid to increase Web3 development on the Terra blockchain.

entry.title: Ethereum Rival NEAR Protocol Raises $350 Million in New Funding
entry.summary: This new raise was led by Tiger Global with participation from FTX Ventures, Dragonfly Capital, and others.

entry.title: Ice Cube: Crypto and NFTs Are ‘The Ultimate Fuck You to the Mainstream’
entry.summary: The legendary rapper, actor, and entrepreneur Ice Cube talks to Decrypt's Andrew Hayward about why his BIG3 basketball league plans to offer fractional team ownership in the form of NFTs, plus his personal interest in crypto.

entry.title: #DecryptLIVE: Crypto, Taxes, and You
entry.summary: Tax Day is coming, and the crypto world is paying attention. Decrypt's Jeff Roberts, Stacy Elliott, and Adriana Hamacher discuss what people and businesses need to know about crypto and taxes with special guest Nicholas Mowbray of Baker Hostetler.

entry.title: gm Podcast, Episode 6: Ditching Big Banks for Bitcoin With Caitlin Long
entry.summary: Caitlin Long spent nearly two decades at big banks Credit Suisse and Morgan Stanley before she went all in on Bitcoin. Now her company Custodia is seeking to offer banking services to crypto companies long shut out by the big banks. She talks to Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about identifying as a Bitcoin maximalist, crypto regulation in DC, and Web3 culture.

entry.title: Crypto on the Campaign Trail: Matt West, Matthew Diemer, Tyler Lindholm at Camp Ethereal 2022
entry.summary: Politicians are embracing crypto on both sides of the aisle. Matt West, running for congress in Oregon, Matthew Diemer, running for congress in Ohio, and former Wyoming Rep. Tyler Lindholm discussed crypto and politics on a panel with Decrypt's Jeff Roberts at Camp Ethereal in Wyoming. As Diemer pointed out, "We have a conservative Republican, a progressive Democrat, and a moderate Democrat on the same stage, unified by crypto and the idea of making sensible regulation."

entry.title: Crypto Taxes Got You Down? Software Can Help
entry.summary: Tax season is upon us, and crypto investors have questions. Tony Dhanjal, Head of Tax at crypto tax software service Koinly, shares tips in this sponsored segment.

entry.title: Pastel Network's Georgiades: How to Protect Your NFTs
entry.summary: Anthony Georgiades, co-founder of Pastel Network, talks to Decrypt's Andrew Hayward at Camp Ethereal 2022 about NFT security and the importance of protecting your digital artwork.

entry.title: Andrew Yang on Crypto Regulation in DC: 'This Train Is Coming. What's the Cargo?'
entry.summary: Andrew Yang, the former presidential and NYC mayoral candidate, talked crypto regulation in DC on Decrypt's gm podcast with Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts. Yang says the days of little or no crypto regulation in DC are "very very quickly coming to end" and that the question now is what the new rules will look like.

entry.title: Gitcoin's Scott Moore Talks Ukraine Fundraising Grant
entry.summary: Gitcoin co-founder Scott Moore tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson all about Gitcoin's GR13 grant, which is raising money for Ukraine and has matching participation from a range of Web3 names like OpenSea, OlympusDAO, NounsDAO, Polygon, Algorand, and more.

entry.title: The Importance of Layer 2: ConsenSys, Nomad, and LayrLabs at Camp Ethereal
entry.summary: Robert Drost, Head of R&D at ConsenSys, talks Layer 2s and building atop Ethereum with James Prestwich of Nomad and Sreeram Kannan of LayrLabs at Camp Ethereal 2022 in Wyoming.

entry.title: ShapeShift, BeetsDAO Talk DAO Creation and Governance at Camp Ethereal
entry.summary: Jordan Garbis, co-founder of BeetsDAO, and Kent Barton, who does tokenomics at ShapeShift DAO, talk to Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Camp Ethereal 2022 in Wyoming about how to start a DAO, the hurdles with growing them, how to handle tokenomics and reward structure, and how to approach bad behavior by DAO members. At the end, they also took questions from the audience.

entry.title: gm Podcast, Episode 5: Andrew Yang Wants You to Join His DAO
entry.summary: The former presidential candidate and NYC mayoral candidate has launched Lobby3, a DC lobbying DAO. He talks to Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about his crypto journey, the potential of DAOs, and the need to blend a Web3 approach with "the old-fashioned way" to spur change in DC.

entry.title: Edward Snowden Talks Governments and Crypto, CBDCs, and Ethereum vs Bitcoin at Camp Ethereal
entry.summary: Edward Snowden gives an extensive interview to Marta Belcher of Filecoin Foundation for Camp Ethereal 2022, taped on February 27. He talks about how governments view crypto as "an evolving threat," how crypto "transforms power relationships," why he thinks Ethereum "suffers from the same privacy problems as Bitcoin," and why he views central bank digital currencies (CBDCs) as "crypto-fascist currencies."

entry.title: Musician Dillon Francis on Ethereum vs Solana for NFTs
entry.summary: Musician and DJ Dillon Francis and Big Night Entertainment managing partner Tim Bonito tell Decrypt's Kate Irwin about their deal for a Boston nightclub residency and record collaboration with DJ duo ESCAPΞPLAN, and give their takes on Ethereum vs Solana for buying and trading NFTs.

entry.title: Musician Dillon Francis: Why I'm Getting Into NFTs
entry.summary: Musician and DJ Dillon Francis tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin what drew him to NFTs, and heaps a lot of praise on DJ 3LAU for pioneering in the space and prompting more artists to get in.

entry.title: Joe Lubin Talks Ethereum 2.0, NFTs, and DAOs at Camp Ethereal
entry.summary: ConsenSys CEO Joe Lubin talked about Ethereum 2.0 timing and impact, the power of DAOs, and gave his honest take on NFTs, Solana, Polygon, and Biden's crypto executive order in an extensive fireside chat with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Camp Ethereal 2022 in Wyoming.

entry.title: Crypto and Effective Altruism: Sam Bankman-Fried Interviews Peter Singer at Camp Ethereal
entry.summary: FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried sits down for a conversation with one of his heroes, the moral philosopher and Princeton University professor Peter Singer, exclusively for Camp Ethereal 2022, powered by Decrypt. They talk animal rights, climate change, effective giving, Bitcoin's energy use, and how crypto is helping Ukraine.
